patthana16.27:4.1: Vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:4.2: Vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:4.3: Vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:4.4: Vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:4.5: Vipākaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu ca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.27:5.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:5.2: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:5.3: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:5.4: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:5.5: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu ca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.27:6.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:6.2: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:6.3: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nahetu ca navipākadhammadhammo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.27:7.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe ekādasa … pe … āsevane cha … pe … vipāke pañca … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.27:8.1: Vipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:8.2: Vipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:8.3: Vipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nanahetu ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.27:9.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:9.2: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:9.3: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nanahetu ca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.27:10.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.27:10.2: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe ….
patthana16.27:10.4: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipāko nanahetu ca navipākadhammadhammo nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.27:11.1: Vipākaṃ nahetuñca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.27:12.1: Hetuyā cuddasa, ārammaṇe cuddasa … pe … āsevane cha … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate cuddasa.
